topic.name: Summary
topic.content:
Although this Sector escaped the worst of the fallout during the cataclysm that befell the western hemisphere, some residual radiation has lingered in what is now a lush wilderness speckled by occasional ruins. The local ecosystem has expressed some... interesting adaptations to these conditions, and whether by chance or design, a number of endemic floral species appear to showcase unique medicinal properties. Harvesting these could prove to be a boon to pharmaceutical research.
Obtain and analyse samples of 3 floral species. Harvest 300 units of Spyce. Our scouts report the presence of territorial predators- be prepared to give these a wide berth.
